h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist
content: You should now see a large rock in the middle of the room with white eggs near it. Drop down and head right, sticking as close to the rock as possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist'.
The content is as follows:
You should now see a large rock in the middle of the room with white eggs near it. Drop down and head right, sticking as close to the rock as possible.
